dialogue.prompt: You arrive outside the Church. It is very empty… The doors are broken and must not have been opened in decades. If you had some tool, you might be able to fix them…

options.desc: Use the hammer to fix the doors
options.narrSays: You use the hammer to fix the Church doors. You can now go inside.
You decide to go back home

dialogue.prompt: You are now inside the church. You see an old man sitting down looking slightly dejected. You go up to him and ask him:

options.userSays: What can I do for you? Are you alright?

options.narrSays: You decide to go back home

dialogue.prompt:
The old man looks up at you with a kind face, as if he hasn’t seen a person enter the church for years. He says “I’m the pastor here, I haven’t had many people come here in a long time. Who are you?” You reply “I’m Hector Kiah, the Prime Minister of Judah and I’m glad to have found you. I was hoping to find someone who would be able to help me rebuild this church!” The pastor frowns suspiciously at your enthusiasm, “Like I said, there hasn’t been anyone here in a long time. Why would anyone want to come here now?” waiting a second to comprehend the situation that the pastor is in he then says, “to test your sincerity, if you can answer these questions correctly I will help you with whatever plans you have. If you don’t answer all the questions correctly I’ll take $100 for each wrong question and give it to the church.
What do you do?

options.desc: Agree to the offer proposed by the Pastor and answer his questions
options.narrSays: You agree. Get ready, a quiz is about to start!

options.userSays: Thank you for your offer, but I'm going to look somewhere else.

dialogue.prompt:
The pastor sighs, "Well alright. I'll join the church you're starting."
Congratulations, your church now has a pastor! Where to next?

options.narrSays: You decide to go back home.

dialogue.prompt: You enter the church and see Pastor Levi praying quietly in the corner. Let's not disturb him.

options.narrSays: You decide to go back home.
